creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in memory of Roberta Grodberg Simmons
description: skull cap; blue and brown fabric; appliqued abstract design edged in blue, yellow and green braid; 1" geometric multicolored cross stitch embroidery at lower edge; coiled silver wire at bottom edge; three large red pompoms at sides and top

7 x 10 1/4 in. (17.78 x 26.04 cm)
2 x 3 in. (5.08 x 7.62 cm) (object part, pompoms, each)
title: Hat
